PackageOracle.name: DA_PARTY_CHANNEL_INST_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PARTY_CHANNEL_INST_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.06.582489000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,party_channel_inst_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_channel_inst_start_dt IN DATE
,party_channel_inst_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,party_channel_inst_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_channel_inst_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_party_channel_inst_xref;

body.name: DA_PARTY_CHANNEL_INST_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PARTY_CHANNEL_INST_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.06.592723000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,party_channel_inst_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_channel_inst_start_dt IN DATE
,party_channel_inst_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_channel_inst_xref.add, parms=' || party_id || '|' || channel_instance_id || '|' || party_channel_inst_role_cd || '|' || party_channel_inst_start_dt || '|' || party_channel_inst_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_party_channel_inst_xref a
(
a.party_id
,a.channel_instance_id
,a.party_channel_inst_role_cd
,a.party_channel_inst_start_dt
,a.party_channel_inst_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.party_id
,add.channel_instance_id
,add.party_channel_inst_role_cd
,add.party_channel_inst_start_dt
,add.party_channel_inst_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_channel_inst_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,party_channel_inst_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,party_channel_inst_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_channel_inst_xref.del, parms=' || party_id || '|' || channel_instance_id || '|' || party_channel_inst_role_cd || '|' || party_channel_inst_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_party_channel_inst_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.party_id = del.party_id
AND a.channel_instance_id = del.channel_instance_id
AND a.party_channel_inst_role_cd = del.party_channel_inst_role_cd
AND a.party_channel_inst_start_dt = del.party_channel_inst_start_dt
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_channel_inst_xref.del');

END del;

END da_party_channel_inst_xref;
